item.title: Best Places to Visit in Hikkaduwa
item.description: Hikkaduwa Hikkaduwa is a seaside resort town in southwestern Sri Lanka.

item.title: Yala National Park Amazing place in Sri Lanka
item.description: Yala There are six country wide parks and 3 flora and fauna sanctuaries within the area of Yala.
